citation: Proclamation under the Burial and Cremation Amendment Act 2018 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Burial and Cremation Amendment Act 2018

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under the Burial and Cremation Amendment Act 2018 fix 26 December 2018 as the day on which all of the provisions of that Act commence.

18 December 2018

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Acting for and on behalf of the Minister for Local Government

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 December 2018

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
